title: I Love You Too Riot
body:
Anyone else feel the love when Rito sends you their love message saying they punished someone you reported?

The sad thing however is that it doesn't tell you which one of the many, many recently reported it was.

replies.body: Still waiting to hear about the player I reported for locking in Camille top despite getting adc in ranked and forcing me to play another lane, pretty sure I was the only one to report her too because no one else seemed to care about me.

> [{quoted}](name=Fitzky,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=l1eE5NEy,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2017-01-08T00:47:12.004+0000)
>
> Still waiting to hear about the player I reported for locking in Camille top despite getting adc in ranked and forcing me to play another lane, pretty sure I was the only one to report her too because no one else seemed to care about me.

You'll be waiting a while because nothing will ever happen.
Does this happen every single time? Because I've never had this and I've reported so many FILTHY CREATURES OF THE NIGHT.

It doesn't, it's a rather rare notification, and only pops up if you are the very last person to report them before they are punished. Not many people see it, but it doesn't mean your reports are doing nothing, it's just a shortcoming of the notification system.
Makes me feel all warm and fuzzy
Typically I think it does. Like, Which ones did you report. which was was being a complete ass. Did you include context in the post via copy paste. Chances are you got that one.
It doesn't give you names, it just says something to the effect of "A player you reported has been punished", though it's usually not too hard to work out who it was as per my other comment.
I was saying common sense and process of elimination can help a lot sweety. ^.^

Him saying the many recently reported implied that his idea of recent was very different from the actuality. His implication was that it would be at least a few games worth of recently, but as far as the notification is concerned it's about 5-10 minutes. I was under the impression your idea of recently aligned with his, as what you said also implied that you would need to consider more than one games of reports to find the one who got punished.

However I must admit I misread your post, and understood context from it that wasn't there. I thought you were implying the notification itself told you something more than it does, so that's my bad for not reading it properly.
It's usually one within 5~ minutes, so pretty much whatever last game you reported. Assuming you reported more than one, whichever one seemed lik htey did it the most consistently.
